definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Higher level studies, however, may also have un¬avoidable methodologic flaws.
sentences.chinese: 但是较高水平的研究也有其不可避免的方法学的瑕疵。

sentences.english: This volume concerns methodology and practice, the nuts-and-bolts of crystal engineering.
sentences.chinese: 这卷关系到方法学和实践，水晶工程的部件。

sentences.english: Researching progress on the synthesis methodology of fluoropyridazines is described.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了氟代哒嗪化合物合成方法学研究进展。

sentences.english: They are a combination of methodology and how-to.
sentences.chinese: 它们其实是方法学和怎样做的结合体。
现在高中还教科学方法学么？

sentences.english: The ABMS is the uppermost and effective research methodology for complex systems.
sentences.chinese: ABMS方法学是研究复杂系统的科学方法论。

sentences.english: Autonomicity of AMSSs is the necessary condition of using ABMS to do research.
sentences.chinese: ABMS方法学是研究复杂系统的科学方法论。

sentences.english: Methodologic and clinical constraints may take account for literature discrepancies.
sentences.chinese: 方法学和临床上的限制，可解释文献资料间的不一致。

sentences.english: Trials under consideration were evaluated by considering whether inclusion criteria were met as well as methodologic quality.
sentences.chinese: 试验评价考虑是否符合选择标准以及方法学的品质。

sentences.english: This includes adopting and following a software development methodology.
sentences.chinese: 这包括采用和遵循软件开发方法学。

sentences.english: No methodology [in and of itself] can fix these issues.
sentences.chinese: 没有任何方法学可以解决这些问题。

definition: practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
research/a study/CL:項|项[xiang4]/to research/to look into
methodology/Discours de la méthode by René Descartes 笛卡兒|笛卡儿[Di2 ka3 er2], 1637

pinyin: Meng2 te4 Ka3 luo2 fang1 fa3
